title: A vindication of chymistry, and chymical medicines Courteous and candid reader, chymistry, is an art that doth both teach and inable us (for our exceeding good and benefit) to seperate purity from impurity; ...
author: Fletcher, R. (Richard), fl. 1676-1677.
notes: Title from caption title and first lines of text.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
